snippet.title: MOTHER: Encore Translation Update - Mother Direct 2024 Update Video
snippet.description:
Encore's going on a world tour!
The MOTHER: Encore Translation Update is out now!

You'll be able to play the game in Japanese, Polish, Brazilian Portuguese, Latin American Spanish, Spain Spanish, Italian and French! Alongside these translations, German and Korean language options will be available at a later date.

On top of that, there are some new features such as a new options menu, remappable controls and a storage system! We've also taken the time to fix some bugs present in the earlier demo builds. 

The demo update is available on our website here:
https://motherencore.com/download.html

You can also watch this year's full Mother Direct here:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PHlB4wvYOnk
